entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr Weasley is described as observing Harry stony-faced. He is also mentioned as being present in the house.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as observing Harry stony-faced along with Mr Weasley and George.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as observing Harry stony-faced along with Mr Weasley and Fred.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley is described as fluttering and straightening her hat. She also reaches up to kiss Percy.

entities.name: scrimgeour
entities.description: Scrimgeour is mentioned as the Minister who has come to visit the Weasleys.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is mentioned as being present in the house and having a conversation with his mother. He is also referred to by his nickname 'Perce'.

relationships.description: Scrimgeour visited Percy at the Weasley house.
Mrs Weasley kissed Percy when he arrived at the house.
